sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getFilteredRecordNames</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getFilteredRecordNames</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var getFilteredRecordNames = Class.create();
getFilteredRecordNames.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {


    getNames: function() {

        var recNames = [];
        var recList = '';

        var gh = new GlideRecord('sys_script_include');
        gh.addEncodedQuery(this.getParameter('sysparm_userFilter'));
        gh.query();
        while (gh.next()) {
            recNames.push(gh.sys_name + '');
        }

        for (var i = 0; i < recNames.length; i++) {
            recList += recNames[i] + '\n';
        }

        if (recNames.length > 20) {
            return 'Please do not filter more than 20 records';
        } else {
            return recList;
        }



    },

    type: 'getFilteredRecordNames'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-08-30 07:59:30</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ba68df0683989250c6695855eeaad36e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getFilteredRecordNames</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ba68df0683989250c6695855eeaad36e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-08-30 08:21:47</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
